text.headline: Welcome to Aargau
text.text: Aargau-canton in northern Switzerland bordering on Germany; capital Aarau area 542 square miles (1409 square kilometers), population 550,900.

text.headline: High quality of life
text.text: The canton of Aargau is an attractive and varied place to live and work. The Rhine, Aare and Reuss rivers form its natural borders to the north, west and southeast, respectively. It is urban, yet manageable as well.

media.caption: "I am a passionate musician – and a moving force for Aargau. Even when my dialect makes it clear that I am actually from the Valais."

text.headline: ABB Schweiz AG
text.text: ABB is a global leader in power and automation technologies, providing a broad range of products and solutions to improve performance and reduce environmental impact for its customers.

media.caption: Kickstart Your Career – ABB’s LEAD Early Career Program

text.headline: LafargeHolcim
text.text: We are global leader in building materials and solutions. With about 75,000 employees in around 80 countries, we operate four businesses segments: Cement, Aggregates, Ready-Mix Concrete and Solutions & Products.

text.headline: Swisslog Company
text.text: Swisslog is a member of the KUKA Group, a leading global supplier of intelligent automation solution.

text.headline: FHNW Brungg-Windisch
text.text: Approximately 4,500 people work, study and research at Campus Brugg-Windisch. The School of Education, Engineering and Business  offer a wide range of courses in basic and further education. For leisure and enjoyment, a variety of cultural and sports events are available for employees and students. The campus features a library, a restaurant, a bar and a café and is also a very popular event location for external clients from all over Switzerland.
